trans-unit.source: Represents a serializable collection of service metadata in XML form.
trans-unit.target: Reprezentuje kolekcję do serializacji metadanych usługi w postaci XML.

trans-unit.source: The MetadataSet class contains a collection of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> objects, each of which contains one dialect of metadata in XML form.
trans-unit.target: Klasa MetadataSet zawiera kolekcję <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>obiektów, z których każdy zawiera jeden dialekt metadanych w postaci XML.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the MetadataSet class is used to pass a group of XML metadata documents to and from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter> objects, such as <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter>.
trans-unit.target: Zazwyczaj klasa MetadataSet używany do przekazywania dokumentów metadanych XML do i z <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter>i <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter>obiekty, takie jak <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter>i <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter> grupy

trans-unit.source: To create a MetadataSet from a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> object of type <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Aby utworzyć MetadataSet z <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>obiektu typu <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>, użyj <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.%23ctor%2A>konstruktora.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>

trans-unit.source: To obtain a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> object of type <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.MetadataSections%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>obiektu typu <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>, użyj <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.MetadataSections%2A>Właściwości.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.MetadataSections%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.ReadFrom%2A> method to load a MetadataSet from XML data and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.WriteTo%2A> method to write the internal metadata to an XML format.
trans-unit.target: Ponadto można użyć <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.ReadFrom%2A>metodę, aby załadować MetadataSet z danych XML i <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.WriteTo%2A>metodę, aby zapisać wewnętrzny metadanych do formatu XML.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.WriteTo%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.ReadFrom%2A>

trans-unit.source: This type implements the structure defined in the WS-MetadataExchange specification.
trans-unit.target: Ten typ implementuje struktury zdefiniowane w specyfikacji WS-MetadataExchange.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref> klasy.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> object.
trans-unit.target: Tworzy nową <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>obiektu.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> class that contains the specified collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref> klasę, która zawiera określonej kolekcji <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> obiektów.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> from `sections`.
trans-unit.target: Tworzy nową <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>z `sections`.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>

trans-unit.source: The metadata values that the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> is to contain.
trans-unit.target: Wartości metadanych <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref> musi zawierać.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Xml.XmlAttribute"></xref> objects that appear in the serialized form of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera kolekcję <xref href="System.Xml.XmlAttribute"> </xref> obiektów, które są wyświetlane w formie serializacji <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlAttribute"></xref> objects that appear in the serialized form of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XmlAttribute"> </xref> Obiektów, które są wyświetlane w formie serializacji <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> objects that represents the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera kolekcję <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> obiektów, które reprezentuje metadanych.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> objects that represents the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Kolekcja <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> obiektów, które reprezentuje metadanych.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> from the specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object.
trans-unit.target: Zwraca <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref> z określonego <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>obiektu.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> from an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object.
trans-unit.target: Tworzy <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>z <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>obiektu.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>

trans-unit.source: The reader to read in XML.
trans-unit.target: Czytnik do odczytu w kodzie XML.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> that contains all the metadata present in the XML stream.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref> zawierający obecny w strumieniu XML metadanych.

trans-unit.source: The reader is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Czytnik <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Implements <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.GetSchema*> method to provide serialization support.
trans-unit.target: Implementuje <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.GetSchema*>metody, aby zapewnić obsługę serializacji.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.GetSchema*>

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>.
trans-unit.target: Zwraca <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object that describes the XML representation of the object that is produced by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.System%23Xml%23Serialization%23IXmlSerializable%23WriteXml%2A> method and accessed by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.System%23Xml%23Serialization%23IXmlSerializable%23ReadXml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Zwraca <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>obiektu, który opisuje reprezentację XML obiektu, który jest generowany przez <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.System%23Xml%23Serialization%23IXmlSerializable%23WriteXml%2A> — metoda i z niego <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.System%23Xml%23Serialization%23IXmlSerializable%23ReadXml%2A> metody.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml*> method to support deserialization from XML.
trans-unit.target: Implementuje <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml*>metody do obsługi deserializacji z pliku XML.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml*>

trans-unit.source: The reader to use when reading XML.
trans-unit.target: Czytnik do użycia podczas odczytywania pliku XML.

trans-unit.source: The reader is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Czytnik <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml*> method to support serialization to XML.
trans-unit.target: Implementuje <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml*>metody do obsługi serializacji XML.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml*>

trans-unit.source: The writer to use when writing XML.
trans-unit.target: Moduł zapisujący używany podczas zapisywania XML.

trans-unit.source: The writer is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Moduł zapisujący jest <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Writes the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> to XML using the specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Zapisuje <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref> XML przy użyciu określonego <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: Writes a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> to an XML stream.
trans-unit.target: Zapisuje <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>w strumieniu XML.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>

trans-unit.source: The writer to use to write the XML.
trans-unit.target: Moduł zapisujący używany do zapisania pliku XML.

trans-unit.source: The writer is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Moduł zapisujący jest <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
